nodes.name: Dirt Road
description: It is a dark and stormy night. You are sore and tired from a hard day's travel,
standing at the end of a long dirt road. A small keep lies to the south.

nodes.name: Keep Entry
description: You are standing in the keep's entry. Low-burning braziers cast long shadows on the walls.
To the south you see a cavernous room.

nodes.name: Great Hall
description: You have entered the Great Hall of the keep. The room is dimly lit, but you see doors in all four directions.
A foul odor emanates from the room to the east.

nodes.name: Armory
description: This small room serves as the armory for the keep.

nodes.name: Kitchen
description: Nothing edible has been prepared here in weeks. There is a pile of rotten meat in a bucket on the floor.
You find nothing else but rat droppings and broken furniture.

nodes.name: Treasure Room
description: The walls are covered in rich tapestries and a large chest sits against the back wall of this room.
